name: CSV to HMRC VAT return
description: A simple system for submitting VAT returns

HMRC_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by HMRC

HMRC_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your application, assigned by HMRC

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
